ratings.notes: proposed_contextual_controlled<TAB>4<TAB>5<TAB>3<TAB>4<TAB>Short note: Responses are contextually relevant and consistent with the persona but could be more natural in tone.

baseline_no_context<TAB>2<TAB>3<TAB>4<TAB>5<TAB>Short note: While professional, lacks immediate relevance to current dynamic context; however, it maintains a high standard of quality and persona consistency.
"Needs to address immediate health concern more directly."
